title: cpdb: Get residue contacts Package
text: R package allows user get intramolecular contacts specific residue solved PDB protein structure. use intended researchers genetic mutations.

title: cpdb: Get residue contacts Package
code: library(devtools) devtools::install_github("karlapenag/cpdb", build_vignettes = TRUE) library(cpdb) #> Warning: replacing previous import 'ggplot2::last_plot' by 'plotly::last_plot' #> when loading 'cpdb'

title: cpdb: Get residue contacts Package
text: function four arguments,pdb, chain, res . pdb chain strings. default chain "". res position number residue protein sequence. distance angstroms. Default = 8. returns text residue contacts.

title: cpdb: Get residue contacts Package
text: function four arguments,pdb, chain, res . pdb chain strings. default chain "". res position number residue protein sequence. distance angstroms. Default = 8. returns ´plot´ closest residues target residue.

title: cpdb: Get residue contacts Package

title:
cpdb : Package for residue contacts of a PDB solved structure
The `cpdb` package provides one important function, namely, `get_contacts()`. — cpdb
text: `get_contacts` function computes contacts giver reisude position. `plot_closest` plots closest residues target given distance angstroms.

title: Compute distance matrix — get_contacts
text: pdb PDB name ID string ch PDB chain string (default "") res Residue position Distance angstroms (default 8 angstroms)

title: Compute distance matrix — get_contacts
code: x <- get_contacts("4q21", "A", 15, 6) #>   Note: Accessing on-line PDB file #> [1] "The residue contacts positions are:" y <- get_contacts("1XI4", "B", 312) #>   Note: Accessing on-line PDB file #> [1] "The residue contacts positions are:"

what: Plot residues at certain distance (angstroms) from specified residue — plot_closest
title: Plot residues at certain distance (angstroms) from specified residue — plot_closest
text: Plot residues certain distance (angstroms) specified residue

title: Plot residues at certain distance (angstroms) from specified residue — plot_closest
Plot residues at certain distance (angstroms) from specified residue — plot_closest
text: pdb PDB name ID string ch PDB chain string (default "") res Residue position Distance angstroms (default 8 angstroms)

title: Plot residues at certain distance (angstroms) from specified residue — plot_closest
text: scatter plot x = distance specified residue.
